definitions.definition: The removal from the fellowship of the Lord's Table (participation in the Lord's Supper ); excommunication or expulsion from a Christian church.
A temporary sanction used within The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints , more severe than formal probation but less severe than excommunication .

main_definition: The removal from the fellowship of the Lord's Table (participation in the Lord's Supper ); excommunication or expulsion from a Christian church.
secondary_definitions: A temporary sanction used within The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints , more severe than formal probation but less severe than excommunication .
